0: It was an excellent stay in a wonderful city with excellent food in the hotel and other restaurants
The hotel offers everything you had expect great rooms super breakfast a nice teras and a good bar
The afternoon tea snacks here were delicious
The bar has fantastic drinks and style
Interesting bars and clubs in the lobby
The food at breakfast is great and we ordered room service one evening which was also excellent
The bar lobby are a great place to relax not too busy with the luxury and privacy of a 5star hotel
The first night after checking in they delivered a fresh fruit plate and later on Christmas day a plate of macaroons and a gift
The food offered at the club lounge was impeccable they offer breakfast with made to order eggs lunch dinner all day snacks and beverages 24 hours
They went out of the way to make sure we were comfortable ideas of where to go and some great restaurants to eat in
1: Way too hectic and not cosy at all it was not busy at all but the waiters ran through the restaurant as if they were in a hurry
What a delight to find a hotel that takes its breakfast offering seriously wide selection and high quality but with excellent personal service
The breakfast was additional but well worth the money there was literally everything your heart could desire and more

The daytime offer in the lounge is good but the breakfast is not good my wife ’s two poached eggs this morning were stone cold indicating that they had previously been cooked and perhaps submerged in cold water until use the bread was hard and basically we left and went elsewhere for breakfast
I requested for a kettle and it took over 30 minutes to be delivered when called room service the staff told me that they have a lot of breakfast orders at the moment and needed to wait
Went for drinks at their bar
Second thing every time we went downstairs and passed through the lobby bar there was hardly ANYONE even there
Would have been better to have an informal bar option as well
The breakfast is one of the best hotel breakfast I ve seen and they offer to bring it to your room which is not the norm
Only negative would be the restaurant ’s dinner menu
